item.title: Table of Contents in Octopress
item.description: 1.安装jQuery 1.1 下载 {% codeblock %} wget -c http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.8.3.min.js wget -c http://fuelyourcoding.com/scripts/toc/jquery.toc.zip <!-- more --> ## 1.2 安装 I.将jquery-1.8.3.min.js放置于source/javascrip

item.title: 在Linux和Windows下同步Octopress
item.description: 一.需求 需要在Win7和Ubuntu下写东西，因此需要实时更新。 二.按照前面的在Windows下搭建Octopress的步骤。唯一不同的是:

item.title: 配置 Octopress
item.description: 一.给Octopress添加评论 1.到DISQUS:http://disqus.com/ 注册一个账号，并且把你的博客地址添加到DISQUS.

item.title: install octopress on windows
item.description: Environment: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Lang: en Install software Install git Get the latest msysgit and install. Install ruby for windows -1.9.2 or 1.9.3 Get RubyInstaller and install. Add the bin path to the System environment’s path where ruby installed eg: C:\Ruby192\bin Get RubyInstaller DevKit It is a self-extracting file and extract it in a place, such as C:\DevKit run the CMD, enter the C:\DevKit

item.title: 在Github上搭建Octopress
item.description: 参考：http://octopress.org/docs/ 1. install git sudo apt-get install git 2. install libyaml wget -c http://pyyaml.org/download/libyaml/yaml-0.1.4.tar.gz tar xvf yaml-0.1.4.tar.gz cd yaml* sudo ./configure sudo make sudo make install 3. install ruby wget -c http://ftp.ruby-lang.org/pub/ruby/1.9/ruby-1.9.3-p327.tar.gz tar xvf ruby-1.9.3-p327.tar.gz cd ruby* sudo ./configure sudo make sudo
